rules: Be nice to one another, respect each other's opinions
No nsfw or inappropriate messages should be sent
If anyone encounters any issue, Ping the @Admin they will address the issue
No spamming please or pinging of @everyone
No racist or homophobic messages, photos ,videos etc
This is an English speaking server so speak in English to the best of your ability
Bot commands must be used only in #bots
People who do not abide with these rules will be banned or muted from the server

moderation.$sendch:
usage: `$sench <channel_id> <message>`
*sends the message to the specific channel.*
moderation.$add_role:
usage: `$add_role <role_name> <user_id>`
*adds a role to a person*
moderation.$remove_role:
usage: `$remove_role <role_name> <user_id>`
*removes a role from a person*
moderation.$kick:
usage: `$kick <user_id> <reason>`
*kicks the user from the server.*
moderation.$mute:
usage: `$mute <user_id> <reason>`
*mutes a person (they cant send messages)*
moderation.$unmute:
usage: `$unmute <user_id>`
*unmutes a person (they are now allowed to send messages)*
moderation.$dm:
usage: `$dm` <user_id> <message>
*sends a message via dm to a person through the bot*

meta.$help:
usage: `$help` or `$help <specific_command>`
*former shows all commands and info. latter shows info about specific command*
meta.$rules:
usage: `$rules` or `$rules <rule_no>`
*prints all the rules or individually*
meta.$sayhello:
usage: `$sayhello`
*sends a message 'hello' with a ping*

rulesfull: **#1.** Be nice to one another, respect each other's opinions|**#2.** Don't send hateful messages|**#3.** No nsfw or inappropriate messages should be sent|**#4.** If anyone encounters any issue, Ping the @Admin they will address the issue|**#5.** No spamming please or pinging of @everyone|**#6.** No racist or homophobic messages, photos ,videos etc|**#7.** This is an English speaking server so speak in English to the best of your ability|**#8.** Bot commands must be used only in #bots|**#9.** People who do not abide with these rules will be banned or muted from the server
